title: Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial: People
body: People         NPS  The Arlington House story is a collection of events and personalities. At Arlington House, the staff work to bring these stories to life. Read through the links on the left for an introduction to the history. Robert E. Lee | George Washington Parke Custis | Mary Anna Randolph Custis Lee | The Lee Children | Jim Parks | Selina Gray | The Syphax Family
